Cobit Bitcoin Wallet is a AN EARLY ALPHA, STILL UNSTABLE community edition fork of Copay that:

- Guarantees to stay on the Bitcoin network.

- Will only implement protocol changes that underwent extensive peer-review & testing and established widespread community consensus.


Not affiliated with BitPay.
